Creep turned around to face Kratos. She was not scared or surprised,
merely=
 defensive. She pointed her left arm at him, and as she did, it
transformed=
 into a cannon barrel with a wicked looking claw at its end.

Creep: Why, t=
hat would be me of course. They were quite savory, if a
bit bland, but they=
 did their job [she patted her gun-arm] very well.
Who might you be, strang=
er?
